pages.text:
[Page Title: Home - HC Provisions]

COASTAL FARE & CRAFTED TAP
Breakfast Menu Dinner Menu In-Room Dining Menu 
Located in the , HC Provisions features various cultures and cuisines of the “Holy City”, Carolina Coast and Low Country. Our chefs work with only the finest ingredients and trusted suppliers to bring the freshest options to our guests.In the Great Room Bar, the tap wall features the ever-growing craft beer catalogue of the region along with a well thought out wine list sure to please all palates. For those looking for a well-crafted cocktail, our mixologists are creating some of the most innovative libations in town...this isn’t your father’s hotel bar.
North Charleston Marriott Hotel 
We love making food, coastal fire & craft tap

The Little Details That Matter

• We can host parties of up to 25 inside the Private Dining Room. Specialty Prix Fixe menus are available with Wine Pairings to enhance the event.
• Beer selection on the tap wall highlights crafted Ales brewed, not just locally, but just down the street from us. Several are brewed right in North Charleston including “Frothy Beard”, “Coast” and “Holy City”.
• Our Mixologists are “Masters of their Craft” and infuse citrus and smoke into crafted cocktails (See Marriott Bourbon Program).
